reference_a:
@article{reeves2020,
  title = {An examination of idiographic networks of posttraumatic stress disorder symptoms},
  author = {Reeves, Jonathan W. and Fisher, Aaron J.},
  date = {2020},
  journaltitle = {Journal of Traumatic Stress},
  volume = {33},
  number = {1},
  pages = {84--95},
  issn = {1573-6598},
  doi = {10.1002/jts.22491}
}
additional_comments: no beep information available; number of max. observations and days taken from maximum observations in data

features.name: beep
features.coding: NA

features.name: felt_enthusiastic
features.coding:
Felt enthusiastic
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible
features.details: Felt enthusiastic
features.labels:
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible
features.construct: enthusiasm, positive affect, affect, extraversion, big five
